subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Many on the grounds for the third round of the Crowne Plaza Invitational at Colonial heeded the call to wear pink in support of Amy Mickelson and to raise awareness for breast cancer research.
snippet: Many on the grounds for the third round of the Crowne Plaza Invitational at Colonial heeded the call to wear pink in support of Amy Mickelson and to raise awareness for breast cancer research.
